'''Cruachan''' is an Irish band originally called [[Minas Tirith]] but changed it early on when they went from a Tolkien folk concept band, to combining black metal and Irish folk to create Folk Metal. <ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=http://www.rock-impressions.com/cruachan_inter1e.htm|articlename=CRUACHAN INTERVIEW WITH Keith Fay!|author=Giancarlo Bolther|dated=2004|accessed=Aug 19, 2025}}</ref>
